DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain Progressive Disease Anatomic Site Within Radiation Field Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that specifies whether or not progressive disease anatomic sites are within the radiation field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain Progressive Disease Anatomic Site
